subject: Policy for introduction of procedure for qualifications of contractors and consultants certified for ISO 9001-2000.
text: HRdu <cly <TTH gfearrut Ta9 Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Tm YTa7, 43v 4aa7 3 TTATT +AT4) 447 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 AT 7 T 9 National Highways Authority of India QH: /Extn.: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) #-5 U 6, 4az7-10, EG;, # frrtft-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-:0, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No: 11041/218/2007-Admn: 08th February 2008 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL (07/2008) [Decision taken on PQ division's file No. 11018/10/2008/PQ] Sub: Policy for introduction of procedure for qualifications of contractors and consultants certified for ISO 9001-2000. It has been decided with the approval of Competent Authority, to introduce procedure for   qualifications of contractors and consultants certified for Quality Management Systems under ISO 9001-2000. Accordingly, following shall be adopted a) W.e.f 01.01.2009 due weightage will be given to the consultants and contractors certified for Quality Management Systems under ISO 900f- 2000 and; b) w.e.f 01.01.2010, Quality Management Systems under ISO 9001-2000 will be a mandatory requirement for qualification of all contractors Iconcessionaires and consultants: 2. All technical divisions are advised to note and take necessary action accordingly: (V.K: Sharma) General Manager (Admn:) To AII Project Directors at PIUs/CMUs to PS to Chairman All Members CGMs CVO AlI GMsIDGMs Library/Hindi Officer NHAL Copy
